name: Elastic Sword
description:
Hello! We're excited to offer you a job as a Cyberspace Cleanup Agent at The Company. Here at The Company, we handle all forms of employment and social order, as it's the year 4198 and the Cyberlords are definitely doing just fine and you don't need to worry about why they've been so quiet lately!

Swing a bouncy elastic sword around in this arcade game made for the #RainbowJam16 game jam!

Features:
  • Multiple endings!
  • Upgrades!
  • Autosave!
  • Music! That might be bad!

Note: Make sure you have the latest version of the .NET framework installed before playing. Windows only for now, sorry!

Note2: Sometimes OBS acts weirdly during the cutscenes, due to an issue with OpenGL. Make sure OBS is set to use DirectX for all its recording and displaying whatnots.
